name: BEST WESTERN BKs Pioneer Motor Lodge

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I've stayed at BKs Pioneer five or six times over the last four or five years, twice for work and the other times when I've found I have to stay overnight in Auckland for connecting flights. I keep coming back because I have a positive experience every time. I give it a four, but it's a four based on the type of accommodation it is - an airport motel, and for an airport motel it's very good. The pick up/drop off service to and from the airport is excellent, the rooms are of a decent size and the bathroom is bigger than my one at home, so no complaints there either. The staff are all helpful and friendly, and as long as I keep receiving the same level of service I'll continue to use BKs Pioneer when I need Auckland airport accommodation.
reviews.title: Good, consistent service every time

reviews.text: I am fusyy when it comes to hotel, motels, and now prefer a classic motel, more room and more comfortable! This is what I experienced here! I am a terrible sleeper so took 1.5 hrs to choose where to stay lol, trip advisor great for the truth...not disapointed, great nights sleep, great bed, quiet and comfortable, great location great service! When I told my sister what I had found she said, your kidding we always stay there! Apparently you fly in from overseas push a button and quick as a flash you are collected, fantastic! Thanks so much for the last minute lift to the airport this morning, no waiting, no problem, thank you! This was for business but I have kids too and would stay again! This is a good choice!
reviews.title: Great Kiwi Hospitality...Great Sleep!

reviews.text: We stayed for one night only before an early flight. Booked a one bedroom unit which was fine for a short stay - two young children and two adults.
reviews.title: Nice and clean. No frills but fine for a short stay

reviews.text: We spent a couple of nights at this hotel and we were surprised at how quiet it was. Rooms were well appointed with a kitchenette and very convenient location to easily get on the freeways. Owners/managers were friendly and helpful. If you have wheels and have some time, make sure to get a meal at the Villa Maria vineyard, which is less than a 5min drive behind the hotel. I would highly recommend to make time to visit Otuataua Stonefields Historic reserve, which is a short drive from the vineyard. Very nice place to stretch the legs and get some fresh air in a quiet setting.
reviews.title: Convenient and spacious rooms

reviews.text: We stayed for one night prior to an early morning flight. Easy to find hotel only a few minutes drive from airport.
reviews.title: Clean room, convenient for airport

reviews.text: I stayed here for one night while we were in transit. We arrived late and departed early, so I can't fully the lodge. It was pretty much a motel, but it was clean and had everything we needed. Toiletries and a fridge were provided, as well as tea and coffee, but no milk. The only thing negative we found was that we could hear people walking about in the rooms above during the early hours of the morning. Maybe there was just someone with very heavy shoes who happened to be above us, or maybe everyone on the lower floor had the same experience. But overall it was fine for a transit stay.
reviews.title: Great for a transit stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked this hotel as we were coming back to Auckland from Rotorua on Saturday afternoon, with a 5:30am flight on Sunday out of Auckland back to Australia. The free shuttle service was excellent. After calling them, they were at the terminal within minutes to pick us up, and took us back to the airport the next morning at our pre-booked time of 3am without fuss. The room was clean and comfortable, and the hotel was only a few minutes from the airport. The staff were friendly and helpful with suggestions for places to eat, and we would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: An easy overnighter

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We showed up late at night with no reservation and as a result were not able to stay there.
reviews.title: Great people at reception

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: However despite the time and our lack of planning the managers were both very friendly and one of them made calls on our behalf to a number of other hotels (also full) and then gave us some advise on areas to check out (which worked). I appreciate the help – and I bet they’d give great service to their customers. We only saw the outside of the hotel and the office – but it all looked well kept. I’d try staying here if I was back in this area – I’d recommend making a reservation.
reviews.title: Convenient Location, Good Shuttle Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Good location, average rooms, a bit overpriced. The downstairs rooms can be noisy from
reviews.title: Basic place to stay near the airport
Couldn't be more pleased!
reviews.text: Absolutely excellent in all regards! Exceptionally clean, conveniently located, and truly superior customer service. As a business traveler, one couldn't ask for more.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thank you -- I'll be back any time I pass through AKL!
reviews.title: Amazing service and convenient location

reviews.text: Well placed near Auckland airport for those pesky over night layovers between flights, this hotel offers free pick up and drop off to the airport (accessible from a free phone call in the terminal) and free wi-fi/broadband once you get to the hotel - these are two really key things for differential advantage in an area with many hotel options to choose from.
reviews.title: Good value , clean accommodation and covenient to the airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived late from our flight and were looked after by Ed the Dutchman. We had enquired after food as we had missed dinner on our flight and arrived very late - his solution was to drive us to a 24 hour supermarket and wait until we purchased food, even though he clearly had loads of paperwork to follow through. He was personable, helpful and his service was beyond the call of duty. This personable service carried onto the morning when we again took advantage of the free transfer to the airport from another staff member.
reviews.title: Its an Airport hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms were large and comfortable with all necessary conveniences. With excellent lastminute and wotif rates available, this is a great place to stay in the Auckland airport surrounds.
reviews.title: Good airport hotel

reviews.text: loved it, what a great motel, just perfect when you need to catch a plane the next day. has everything you need, very very clean, friendly service, has plenty of towels (always important), lovely bathroom complimentary toiletries (also important). we would definitely come back. had a great feel about it
reviews.title: Love it - perfect airport motel

reviews.text: Location
reviews.title: Good Airport Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As it says on the can – very close to the airport and the free mini-bus service works well. There is a bus stop outside the hotel with a fairly regular service right to the city centre – main bus, train and ferry terminals. It takes an hour and cost $10 for an all day ticket – after 9am. You can get off at the hospital for the War Memorial Museum.
reviews.title: Good enough for an overnight airport stop, but not much else.

reviews.text: There are restaurants and a supermarket close by.
reviews.title: Nice stop

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room
reviews.title: Very decent motel, closed to the airport.

aka: Best Western Bks Pioneer Motor Hotel Mangere
description: Conveniently located only 4 minutes from the Auckland International Airport, New Zealand, Best Western BKs Pioneer Motor Lodge offers you quality, affordable accommodation. As our guest, you’ll enjoy our 24 hour courtesy airport shuttle service for the International and Domestic terminals.
